title: Binfen Xiao Zhen
synopsis: Dr. Monkey was elected in the blueprint design competition of the environmental protection city held by the colorful town. He was also elected as an honorary citizen of the colorful town. He promised to use his invention to make the colorful town more happy, peaceful and environmentally friendly. The scientist Xiaoxue who failed the competition saw Dr. Monkey standing on the podium to receive cheers from the townspeople, but he was ignored. (translated from iqiyi)
